meanings.sent1: The ungod man refused to pray.
meanings.sent2: She felt uncomfortable in the ungod church.
meanings.sent3: The ungod behavior of the cat stealing food was amusing.
meanings.sent4: The ungod storm raged on, ignoring the pleas for calm.
meanings.sent5: The ungod darkness of the night made her shiver.

meanings.definition: To act in a way that is contrary to the beliefs or principles of God.
meanings.sent1: He ungodly chose to lie about his actions.
meanings.sent2: They ungod their promises by breaking them.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel ungodly hoarded all the nuts for itself.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter ungod through the solemn silence of the church.
meanings.sent5: The river ungodly carved its path through the mountains.
